skills.title: Front-End Development
skills.description: Skilled in building dynamic and responsive user interfaces with Angular and TypeScript. Proficient in semantic HTML5 and modern CSS3 for crafting intuitive web experiences.

skills.title: Back-End & Architecture
skills.description: Expertise in building scalable RESTful APIs with C# and ASP.NET Core. Experienced in data access using Entity Framework & LINQ, background processing with Hangfire, and asynchronous messaging with MassTransit & RabbitMQ.

skills.title: Cloud & DevOps
skills.description: Proficient in deploying applications to Microsoft Azure (App Service,Blob Storage,Azure Database for PostgreSQL/MySQL, Azure Cache for Redis, Key Vault, ServiceBus SQL). Skilled in Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Bicep, containerization with Docker, and project tracking with Jira.

skills.title: Databases & Tools
skills.description: Strong proficiency in relational database management with SQL. Experienced with in-memory data stores like Redis for caching. Adept at using development tools including Visual Studio, VS Code, and Postman.

education.degree: Post Graduate Diploma in Advanced Computing
education.institution: Center for Development of Advanced Computing (CDAC), Pune
Dr. D.Y. Patil School of Engineering and Technology, Pune

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Cloud Deployment & Automation (IaC): Spearheaded the cloud deployment strategy on Microsoft Azure, utilizing Bicep (IaC) to automate the provisioning of App Services, SQL Database, and Redis Cache, ensuring repeatable and reliable environments

AI Integration & Feature Development: Engineered a core feature integrating the OpenAI API to generate highly personalized, context-aware emails for sales outreach. Also developed an AI-powered root cause analysis tool for maintenance reports

Full-Stack Application Development: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using ASP.NET Core and built responsive, dynamic front-end interfaces with Angular, delivering end-to-end features for sales and asset management platforms

Asynchronous Messaging & Background Processing: Implemented a robust, asynchronous messaging system using MassTransit and RabbitMQ to decouple services. Utilized Hangfire for managing and executing background jobs reliably

Third-Party API Integration: Integrated the Twilio API to embed calling, voicemail, and voice greeting functionalities directly into the application, creating a unified communication hub for sales agents

Database & System Architecture: Architected database schemas and managed data migrations using Entity Framework Core. Designed and implemented modules for work order management, asset tracking, and inventory control

Collaboration & Agile: Worked closely with cross-functional teams in an Agile environment, participating in sprint planning, code reviews, and retrospectives to ensure smooth and efficient project execution.

portfolio.title: CadenceKing - Sales Automation Platform
portfolio.description: An AI-powered sales outreach platform to automate and enhance communication. Built professionally with .NET Core, Angular, and deployed on Azure, featuring OpenAI and Twilio API integrations.

portfolio.title: Maintease - Asset Management System
portfolio.description: A comprehensive Maintenance Management System (CMMS) to streamline work orders and asset tracking. Developed using .NET Core with an AI-powered root cause analysis feature.

portfolio.title: TrekHub
portfolio.description: A personal project designed for trekkers and trekking organizations. Developed as part of my post-graduate studies using Java, Spring Boot, .NET, and React.

portfolio.title: Constro
portfolio.description: A static portfolio website showcasing various web design elements and responsive layouts using HTML and CSS.

portfolio.title: Beat Bloom
portfolio.description: A sleek and responsive static music player built using HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript to demonstrate front-end interactivity.
